name: pico-engine
author: picolabs.io
description: Pico Engine supports the pico-based reactive programming environment. See http://picolabs.io for more information.

scripts.out: lerna clean --yes && lerna exec -- npm i && rm -rf packages/*/package-lock.json && lerna exec --bail=false -- npm out
scripts.clean-setup: lerna clean --yes && rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json packages/*/package-lock.json && npm run setup -s
scripts.build: cd packages/krl-parser && npm run build && cd ../krl-stdlib && npm run build && cd ../pico-engine-core && npm run build && cd ../pico-engine && npm run build
